name: backward
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: backward
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: When he was a child, his teachers thought he was backward (= unable to learn as much as most children).
example.egtrans: 小时候，老师认为他愚笨迟钝。

example.eg: People still think of it as a backward country/region/area (= one without industry or modern machines).
example.egtrans: 人们仍然认为这是一个落后的国家／区域／地区。

dsense.name: backward
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: towards the direction that is the opposite to the one in which you are facing
trans_examp.trans_cn: 向后的；与面对方向相反的

example.eg: She left without a backward glance.
He did a fantastic backward somersault.
example.egtrans: 他做了一个漂亮的后空翻。

name: backward
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.
